neurotools.signal.morlet module

neurotools.signal.morlet.normalized_morlet(m, w)[source]

See morlet(m,w)

This applies post-processing such that the sum absolute magnitued of the wavelet is 1

neurotools.signal.morlet.prepare_wavelet_fft_basis(fa, fb, resolution, L, w, Fs)[source]

Fs=1000.

neurotools.signal.morlet.fft_cwt(beta, fa, fb, w=4.0, resolution=0.1, Fs=1000.0)[source]

beta is data, should be Ntimes x NCH can do multiple at once!

returns Nch x Nfreq x Ntimes

neurotools.signal.morlet.fft_cwt_transposed(data, fa, fb, w=4.0, resolution=0.1, Fs=1000.0, threads=1)[source]
Parameters

data (numeric) – NCH x Ntimes list of signals to transform

Returns

  • freqs (float) – frequencies

  • result (wavelt transforms) – Nch x Nfreq x Ntimes

neurotools.signal.morlet.logfreqs(fa, fb, nfreq)[source]

neurotools.signal.morlet.fft_cwt_transposed_logspaced(data, fa, fb, w=4.0, nfreqs=None, threads=1, Fs=1000)[source]
